articles.title: "We Agree On...": PM Modi, Egypt President Discuss Israel-Hamas War - NDTV
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Egyptian President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi on Saturday discussed the worsening security and humanitarian situation in West Asia.
articles.content:
India expressed grave concern over the worsening situation in Gaza.
